objectives: To generate significant economic benefits to the country through the development of low cost renewable power sources.
main_components: Construction of 24m high & 144m long main dam, 19m high & 48m long diversion dam, 2.7m diameter & 850m long diversion tunnel, 5.4m diameter & 3Km long main tunnel, 35MW surface power station (2 units of 17.5MW), switch yard and 4Km long transmission line.
Objective/s: To generate significant economic benefits to the country through the development of low cost renewable power sources.
